Summary: It flew overhead to the SW. Low toned sound. Red lights blinked in sequence around 2 sides. Flew low and slow. Saw it again about 5 minutes later going SE up to go over Sierras.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Reedley
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was standing at kitchen sink and heard a odd, low-toned sound\noise that seemed close\overhead. i went out on the back deck and looked up. i saw a large, dull black area (no stars shining in this area) in sky above me. i then saw 7 red, blinking lights (4 on right side, 3 on left. blinking in sequence up one side and down the other) around 2 sides of a triangle-shape moving low in the sky and slowly in a straight line. it flew overhead and to the sw. i lost sight of it over the near horizion of trees and buildings. i saw no lights on the back side or underneath. i was amaized at how low and slow this very large object was flying. heard the same noise, went out onto the deck and saw it again about 5 minutes later at a greater distance, going se flying up the mountain side to go over sierras. same dark shape with 8 sequentially blinking red lights - 4 on each side this time. object did not have a light at the tip between the lights on each side. there was no other lights such as an aircraft's wing lights. when i told husband who was in the house, he said he thinks it was a "flying wing" spi plane. i had an eirie, very wierd feeling watching this large thing fly so close and so slowly overhead- to the point that i thought i would find out if anyone else saw this or something like it or knows what it was.
